name: Frenchy's Rockaway Grill
description: Iconic beachfront spot famous for their grouper sandwich and live music. Grab a seat on the deck for sunset views over the Gulf.

name: Crabby's Beachside Pavilion
description: Casual beachside dining with fresh seafood, craft cocktails, and live entertainment. Right on the sand with panoramic Gulf views.

name: Clearwater Marine Aquarium
description: Home of Winter the dolphin from Dolphin Tale. A rescue-focused aquarium with interactive exhibits, animal encounters, and boat tours.

name: Pier 60 Clearwater
description: Nightly sunset celebration with street performers, artisan vendors, and live music. The pier itself is great for fishing and dolphin spotting.

name: North Clearwater Beach
description: The quieter, less crowded end of Clearwater Beach. Perfect for shelling, peaceful walks, and nesting sea turtle season (May - October).

name: Clearwater Beach Municipal Marina
description: Hub for fishing charters, dolphin cruises, parasailing, and jet ski rentals. Book a sunset cruise for an unforgettable evening on the water.

name: Pelican Walk Plaza Clearwater Beach Florida
description: Stylish shopping center featuring boutiques for clothes & beachwear, plus bars & casual restaurants.

name: Surfside Tap House
description: Chill craft beer bar steps from the beach. Great selection of local brews, live music on weekends, and a laid-back island vibe.

name: Jeep Pickup - Main Station
description: Pick up your complimentary electric Jeep here! Valid ID required. Vehicles must be returned by 8 PM. First come, first served.

name: Jeep Pickup - North Station
description: Secondary electric Jeep pickup location at the north end. Convenient if you're starting your day at the quieter beaches.

name: Coco's Crush Bar Original
description: Breezy outdoor tiki bar serving bar grub, frozen drinks & beers, with live music & games.

name: Courtyard by Marriott Clearwater Beach
address: 455 E Shore Dr, Clearwater Beach, FL 33767
description: Surrounded by water views in the heart of Clearwater Beach. Located right on Clearwater Bay with a marina, our hotel offers modern, comfortable guest rooms close to everything you love. Soak up the sun on one of the nearby sandy beaches or enjoy a dip in our beautiful outdoor pool.

name: AC Hotel Clearwater Beach
description: Set on Clearwater Beach Island and overlooking the Gulf of Mexico, this laid-back hotel is a 2-minute walk from Clearwater Beach, a mile from Clearwater Marine Aquarium and 7 miles from Highway 19.

name: Flipside Pizza
description: Now open! A beach day doesn't count until you get Flipside Pizza. Stop by for handcrafted pizzas and bold grinders that go big on flavor. We proudly serve local beers, organic wines, and sunny cocktails. Enjoy good times and Clearwater Beach charm at Flipside! Located on the Marina at Courtyard Clearwater Beach

name: Soul Mediterranean Cuisine
description: Comfy eatery serving branzino and other Mediterranean fare in a warm setting

name: Clear Sky Cafe
description: Located near the beach, this no-frills cafe offers a seafood-focused menu & live music.

name: The Shipwreck
description: Colorful watering hole with a nautical vibe, plus nightly DJ music, happy hour, pool tables & darts.

name: Fairfield by Marriott Inn & Suites Clearwater Beach
description: Offering views of the Gulf of Mexico, this informal hotel is a 4-minute walk from Clearwater Beach, a mile from SR-60 and 2 miles from Clearwater Marine Aquarium.

name: Little Toot Dolphin Adventure
description:
Dolphins love the Little Toot and we offer our passengers a unique and memorable experience at affordable prices. Sightseeing tours available on the Original Little Toot and the Little Toot II.

Located at 25 Causeway Blvd. Slip 12
Clearwater Beach

name: Caladesi Island State Park
description: Island park with white sand beaches plus swimming, boating, fishing & picnic facilities.

name: Sand Key Park
description: Expansive white-sand beach offering plenty of room for picnics, surfing & other outdoor activities.

name: Clearwater Ferry
description: Our route services Clearwater and Dunedin with stops at Downtown Clearwater, Clearwater Beach Marina (near Pier 60) and Dunedin Marina (near breweries, shops and restaurants). While we dont require reservations, we encourage them to ensure you have a seat on board. Walk-ons are welcome if capacity permits.
